entry.title: How'd We Meet? Playing Video Games
entry.summary:
Author: AgentofSciFi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,743Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 478

Summary: Rewrite of "How'd We Meet? Video Games"Hello Ultimate Mecha Strike Players! You are currently one of the top 150 players for your server. You have been entered into an international tournament! Each player will be randomly paired with 6 other people, from all over the world. You will have 10 weeks to prepare before the tournament. May the best Mecha team win!No one could have predicted what one video game tournament would turn into, but it sets these seven kids on a path that would shape the next generation of superheroes.*Tags will be added as I continue on with the story, I don't want to give too much away at the beginning

entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,636Chapters: 18/20Kudos: 175

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,936Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 156

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story.A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim.To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course!And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien.Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: Corporate Jargon
entry.summary:
Author: ggomo_springtime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,166Chapters: 15/22Kudos: 1,075

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bosses’ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.

entry.title: Staying At Wayne Manor
entry.summary:
Author: FoxyRouge_99

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,061Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 94

Summary: Ok so this is a working title so probs will be changed.Damianette is already official. After Lila joined the class, Marinette's world went downhill. She lost all her friends and people she could trust. But with help from her partner and new friends, Hawkmoth was defeated. Now with identities revealed and new revelations, there is no use for the miraculous. But after the Miraculous Trio (as they now call themselves) join the Justice League to help with abroad crime, things start to look up. After Marinette meets robin, and then afterwards Damian, they both immediately hit it off. A year later, Damianette is official (but secret), friendships are blooming and all is well. But then, the akuma class wins a trip to Gotham to stay at Wayne manor. With Lila and web of lies following, Marinette goes to Gotham. Now reunited with her boyfriend, it is getting all the harder to keep them a secret. Will they manage it? Will Lie-la and her lies get their first? Will she be exposed?

entry.title: My Shadow
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,204Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 1,723

Summary: When Marinette was a little girl, she had a friend. He never spoke, never told her his name or anything of the sort, but he was he best friend reguardless. He always followed her everywhere, people would sometimes forget he was even there because of how silent he was. Everyone called him her shadow, matching her move for move, going where she went without a word. It was a fitting name.Shadow disappeared when Marinette turned 8, he only came back 3 years later when she was 11. He came back different, changed in ways she couldn't explain.Now, at 18 years old, Marinette needs his help. Will he answer her call?

Here? In Gotham?” Jason asked skeptically. “Not back home in the City of Love?”“Yeah.”

entry.title: Star No Star
entry.summary:
Author: StrawberryFrankenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 524Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: When the Batfamily follows a trail of blood across the ocean, Damian Wayne finds himself in Paris, a city far brighter than Gotham, but no less haunted. Something is wrong here. The shadows don’t just follow him...they whisper, they bite, they bleed.In the middle of it all stands Marinette Dupain-Cheng: bright, brilliant, and far more dangerous than she looks. Damian doesn’t believe in fate, but he can’t escape her orbit. Not when Parisian heroes clash with Gotham’s darkness, not when Hawk Moth’s corruption intertwines with a Gotham villain’s cruelty, not when every battle leaves more scars on skin and soul alike.Secrets cut deeper than knives. Trust is a weapon. And love, Damian learns, can be the most terrifying battlefield of all.

entry.title: I Accidentally Found Out My Father’s Secret, My Stepsister’s a Pathological Liar, and Now I’m Teaming Up with Ladybug (Who Might Be Her Nemesis… and She’s Kinda Cute, So That’s Fine)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,830Chapters: 3/12Kudos: 3

Summary: Tim Drake’s minor prank shockingly escalates into a deadly blood feud, forcing Damian Wayne to re-evaluate his origins and who he should be loyal to. Damian believes he’s the son of Deathstroke, so he embarks on a desperate mission to prove his true identity to his father, Bruce Wayne, by hunting down and killing Deathstroke himself. The fallout from this ordeal leaves Damian shaken, setting him on a new path to find any other children his parents may have sired. His quest leads him to Paris, where a DNA test confirms a shocking truth: he has an older sister named Lila Rossi, a secret daughter of Bruce Wayne! He is now obligated to take the girl in; a vast conspiracy claimed the House of Waynes, and he is compelled to protect one of their own, regardless of her wishes.

Author: whats_in_a_username

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,587Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 464

Summary: The justice league need to check their emails more often. What had started as an excuse to find more work instead of giving into some much needed sleep from an exhausted Tim Drake, had quickly and drastically changed into a Batfamily trip to Paris in order to see what the hell was going on.

entry.title: Masks Under Masks
entry.summary:
Author: Judysupremus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,203Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 88

Summary: The air is still and heavy, carrying no sound of distant cries or alarms. The quiet is in stark contrast to the sound of fighting that comes from his earpiece. Danger is never far away in Gotham. But Batman takes a brief moment to take in the view of towering skyscrapers and kaleidoscope of colors from all the lights. The moment passes and he prepares to launch himself to the next roof and continue his patrol.Only to freeze at the subtle and sudden presence of a breeze. It lifts the sounds of the city into the night sky. He turns quickly to his right and pulls up short. The figure sharing his perch is in white and arctic blue with...rabbit ears."Violet." With a slight nod he acknowledges them.The figure salutes and just...portals away.
